alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 19 at 10:18PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DAVIDSON...SOUTHERN SUMNER AND NORTHWESTERN WILSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1018 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goodlettsville, or 11 miles west of Gallatin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, Millersville, Old Hickory, and Green Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 92 and 99. Interstate 24 near mile marker 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
